p: Patients with thyroid dysfunctions may also benefit from using preparations from Potentilla alba L. (White cinquefoil). It has been shown that extracts prepared from the rhizomes of Potentilla alba have thyrotropic properties and have been used to treat patients with hypo- and hyperthyroidism [ 5â€“ 7]. Potentilla alba extracts also have demonstrated anti-inflammatory, anti-microbial, antioxidant, and adaptogenic properties [ 8, 9].
